enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: Parties were briefed on UNFCCC Article 6 (education, training and public awareness) during an SBI plenary meeting on 29 November, which focused on: the new UNFCCC Climate Change Information Network (CC:iNet), an internet information clearing house; regional workshops (FCCC/SBI/2005/21 and FCCC/SBI/2005/14); and UNEP`s work on Article 6.
A contact group chaired by Crispin d`Auvergne (Saint Lucia) developed draft conclusions on the issue.
The group met several times to finalize text, with no serious disagreements emerging.
The final conclusions were adopted by SBI on 6 December.
